original: gang gi phyir 'gag pa med pas chad pa med de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gag pa med pas chad pa med de /

original: don gcig pa ma yin pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gcig pa ma yin pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-identity in meaning is because of non-cessation.

original: 'ong ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ong ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-coming is because of non-arising.

original: 'gro ba med pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-going is because of non-cessation.

original: brtag pa gzhan yang skye ba ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir lhag ma thams cad la de bzhin du mngon par zhen pa dag med do //
analyzed: brtag pa gzhan yang skye ba ni 'gag pa med pa'i phyir lhag ma thams cad la de bzhin du mngon par zhen pa dag med do //
translated: Another investigation: Arising is because of non-cessation. There is no such adherence to all the remaining [terms].

original: brtag pa gzhan yang gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni gang gi phyir de nyid kyang ma yin la gzhan yang ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam pa gsum pas kyang de la skye ba mi 'thad pas de'i phyir skye ba med do //
analyzed: brtag pa gzhan yang gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni gang gi phyir de nyid kyang ma yin la gzhan yang ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam pa gsum pas kyang de la skye ba mi 'thad pas de'i phyir skye ba med do //
translated: Another examination: Whatever arises in dependence on something is not that, and it is not something other. Therefore, because of the three modes, arising is not tenable. Therefore, there is no arising.

original: de'i phyir skye ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med do //
translated: Because there is no arising, there is no coming.

original: 'ong ba med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do //
analyzed: 'ong ba med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do //
translated: Because there is no coming, there is no going.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni gang gi phyir de nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa med do //
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni gang gi phyir de nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir rtag pa med do //
translated: Another enumeration: Whatever arises in dependence on something is not that, and it is not something other. Therefore, because it is not that, there is no permanence.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir chad pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir chad pa med do //
translated: Because it is not something other, there is no annihilation.

original: 'di ni brtag pa gzhan te /
analyzed: 'di ni brtag pa gzhan te /
translated: This is another examination:

original: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir de nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir de nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever arises in dependence on something is not that, and it is not something other. Therefore, because it is not that, there is no identity.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not something other, there is no difference.

original: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
translated: This is another way of saying it.

original: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid med do /
analyzed: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid med do /
translated: Whatever arises in dependence on something else does not have intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir skye ba med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir skye ba med do //
translated: Because it does not have intrinsic nature, it is not produced.

original: skye ba med pa'i phyir don gcig pa yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i phyir don gcig pa yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not produced, it is not the same in meaning as what is different in meaning.

original: skye ba med pa kho na'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa kho na'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med do //
translated: Because it is not produced, it does not come or go.

original: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
translated: This is another way of saying it.

original: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: gang la brten nas gang 'byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Whatever arises in dependence on something else does not have intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par thams cad kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par thams cad kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because it does not have intrinsic nature, it is not to be apprehended by any of the special terms such as â€œcessation.â€

original: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan te /
translated: This is another way of saying it.

original: de la tshig snga ma bzhi po 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa rtag pa med pa'i mthar thug pa dag ni phal cher rang gi gzhung lugs kyi yongs su gtogs pa yin pas de dag ni @31b rnam par bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la tshig snga ma bzhi po 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa rtag pa med pa'i mthar thug pa dag ni phal cher rang gi gzhung lugs kyi yongs su gtogs pa yin pas de dag ni @31b rnam par bshad zin to //
translated: The first four phrases, â€œwithout cessation,â€ etc., which end with â€œwithout final liberation,â€ are for the most part included in our own system, so they have already been explained.

original: phyi ma gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzhan gyi gzhung lugs kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin pas de dag rnam par bshad par bya ste /ğŸ”½grangs can dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig go zhes kun tu bsgrubs pas de bzlog pa'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzhan gyi gzhung lugs kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin pas de dag rnam par bshad par bya ste / grangs can dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig go zhes kun tu bsgrubs pas de bzlog pa'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //
translated: The last four phrases are included in the systems of others, so they will now be explained.ğŸ”½The SÄá¹ƒkhyas assert that cause and effect are the same, so to refute that, it says, â€œnot the same.â€

original: bye brag pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad do zhes kun tu bsgrubs pas de bzlog pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad do zhes kun tu bsgrubs pas de bzlog pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: The VaiÅ›eá¹£ikas assert that cause and effect are different, so to refute that, it says, â€œnot different.â€

original: de dag gnyis ka yang dngos po rnams la bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag yod par mngon par zhen pas de dag 'gro ba dag tu bsdus nas de dag bzlog pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa bstan to //
analyzed: de dag gnyis ka yang dngos po rnams la bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag yod par mngon par zhen pas de dag 'gro ba dag tu bsdus nas de dag bzlog pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa bstan to //
translated: Since both of them conceive that things have different activities, they are included among the schools of migrating beings. In order to refute them, the nonexistence of coming and the nonexistence of going are taught.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: don med na 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par dag pa ming 'byung bas de'i phyir gang dag yod na 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par dag 'byung bar bsam pa'i dngos po rnams yod do //
analyzed: don med na 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par dag pa ming 'byung bas de'i phyir gang dag yod na 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming gi khyad par dag 'byung bar bsam pa'i dngos po rnams yod do //
translated: If things do not exist, then the specific terms such as cessation would not arise. Therefore things that exist are those in dependence upon which the specific terms such as cessation arise.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: In response, Aryadeva says:ğŸ”½If names and their referents were established,

original: ming dang ming can dag rab tu grub na ni 'gag pa la sogs pa de dag gi ming gi khyad par dag kyang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: ming dang ming can dag rab tu grub na ni 'gag pa la sogs pa de dag gi ming gi khyad par dag kyang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur grang na /
translated: then their specific terms such as cessation would be established.

original: de dag ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de dag ni mi 'thad do //
translated: But they are not tenable.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di la ming dang ming can dag gcig pa nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'di la ming dang ming can dag gcig pa nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Here, if names and their referents were established as being either the same or different,ğŸ”½then their specific terms such as cessation would be established.

original: gnyis ka ltar yang mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gnyis ka ltar yang mi 'thad do //
translated: It is not tenable that they are both.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not tenable?

original: re zhig gal te ming gang yin pa de nyid ming can yin par gyur na de lta na ming can gcig pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: re zhig gal te ming gang yin pa de nyid ming can yin par gyur na de lta na ming can gcig pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If the name were the bearer of the name, then the name and the bearer of the name would be the same.

original: de ltar gcig pa nyid yin na ma zhes brjod pa na kha tshig par 'gyur ba rigs na tshig par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gcig pa nyid yin na ma zhes brjod pa na kha tshig par 'gyur ba rigs na tshig par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they were the same, then when one says â€œmother,â€ the mouth would be burned, but it is not burned.

original: gzhan yang 'di na sgra la mkhas pa dag byed pa po dang las rnam par dbye ba'i phyir kun tu bsgrubs pas de'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di na sgra la mkhas pa dag byed pa po dang las rnam par dbye ba'i phyir kun tu bsgrubs pas de'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, here, because the grammarians distinguish the agent from the action, they are not the same.

original: ci ste ming yang gzhan la ming can yang gzhan yin par gyur na ni de lta na tha dad pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste ming yang gzhan la ming can yang gzhan yin par gyur na ni de lta na tha dad pa nyid yin te /
translated: But if the name were one thing and the bearer of the name were another, then they would be different.

original: de gnyis rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de gnyis rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod do //
translated: But since they would be causeless, that is unacceptable.

original: ming can gyi ming yang 'thad pa yin na ming can med na de gang gi ming can ming med par yang ming can zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
analyzed: ming can gyi ming yang 'thad pa yin na ming can med na de gang gi ming can ming med par yang ming can zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
translated: If the name is tenable as the name of the named, then if the named does not exist, it is untenable to say â€œthe name of the namedâ€ when there is no name.

original: gang gis de la ming du btags par gyur pa de'i phyir de gnyis tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin no //ğŸ”½de ltar gang gi phyir ming dang ming can de gnyis gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid du 'grub par mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming @32a * //
analyzed: gang gis de la ming du btags par gyur pa de'i phyir de gnyis tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin no // de ltar gang gi phyir ming dang ming can de gnyis gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid du 'grub par mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa'i ming @32a * //
translated: And because it is designated by that name, therefore they are not different.

original: gi khyad par rnams mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: gi khyad par rnams mi 'grub bo //
translated: Thus, because it is not tenable to establish that the name and the named are the same or different, therefore the distinctions of the names such as â€œcessationâ€ are not established.

original: gzhan yang lung gi tshad ma las kyang mdo sde las /
analyzed: gzhan yang lung gi tshad ma las kyang mdo sde las /
translated: Moreover, in terms of scriptural valid cognition, a sÅ«tra says:

original: ming ni smig rgyu 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: ming ni smig rgyu 'dra ba ste /
translated: A name is like a mirage.

original: gal te smig rgyu 'dra ba yin na phyin ci log yin la /
analyzed: gal te smig rgyu 'dra ba yin na phyin ci log yin la /
translated: If it is like a mirage, it is distorted.

original: gang phyin ci log pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang phyin ci log pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin no //
translated: And that which is distorted is not real.

original: gang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pas rab tu phye ba des yang dag pa zhes bya bar mi rigs so zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: gang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pas rab tu phye ba des yang dag pa zhes bya bar mi rigs so zhes gsungs pas /
translated: Since it is untenable that a name that is not real is distinguished by a conception to be real, it is not tenable that it is real.

original: de'i phyir lung gi tshad mas kyang ming dang ming can de gnyis su mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir lung gi tshad mas kyang ming dang ming can de gnyis su mi 'grub ste /
translated: Therefore, even by the valid knowledge of scripture, those two, name and the bearer of the name, are not established.

original: de gnyis ma grub na 'gag pa la stsogs pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pa dag mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de gnyis ma grub na 'gag pa la stsogs pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pa dag mi 'grub po //
translated: If those two are not established, conceptions of the name cessation and so on are not established.

original: 'di'i phyir yang 'gag pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang 'gag pa mi 'thad de /
translated: For this reason also cessation is untenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is seen in the world.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba mthong ste /
translated: Thus it is seen in the world that things are said to be without cessation.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: bskal pa dang po pa'i 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i dbye ba gang dag 'gag pa de dag gal te 'gag par gyur na da ltar gyi dus na 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa dag mi snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: bskal pa dang po pa'i 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i dbye ba gang dag 'gag pa de dag gal te 'gag par gyur na da ltar gyi dus na 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa dag mi snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na /

original: snang bas de'i phyir 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: snang bas de'i phyir 'gag pa med do //
translated: But they do appear. Therefore they do not cease.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /

original: skye ba med do //
analyzed: skye ba med do //
translated: Arising does not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is seen in the world.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de mthong ste /
translated: Thus, it is seen in the world that things are said to be â€œwithout arising.â€

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

analyzed: bskal pa dang po'i 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag med pa da ltar gyi 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa 'ga' yang med de /

analyzed: gal te de dag med par da ltar gyi dus kyi 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa dag snang bar gyur na ni /
translated: If the present rice and so on appeared without them,

translated: Here, NÄgÄrjuna explains,

translated: Why is that?

analyzed: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is seen in the world.

analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams chad pa med pa zhes bya ba de mthong ste /

analyzed: gal te chad pa yin na 'byung ba nyid mi dmigs par 'gyur ba zhig na /

analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

original: rtag pa yod do //
analyzed: rtag pa yod do //
translated: Permanence exists.

analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /

original: rtag pa med do //
analyzed: rtag pa med do //
translated: Permanence does not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /

translated: Because it is seen in the world.

analyzed: 'di ltar @32b 'jig rten na dngos po rnams rtag par mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba de mthong ste /
translated: Thus, in the world, one sees that it is not tenable to say that things are permanent.

analyzed: 'bras s'a lu'i sa bon myu gu'i dus na mi dmigs te / de ltar gang gi phyir myu gu'i dus na /
translated: A rice seed is not observed at the time of the sprout.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is seen in the world.

analyzed: 'di na 'bras s'a lu'i sa bon myu gu ma yin no //

original: gal te don gcig pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te don gcig pa nyid yin na /

analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu zhes tha dad par rjod par de dag byed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: they would not be described as different, as seed and sprout.

original: de dag tha dad par rjod par byed pas de'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag tha dad par rjod par byed pas de'i phyir don gcig pa ma yin no //

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

analyzed: gal te don gcig pa nyid du mi 'dod na /

original: des na dngos po rnams don tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dngos po rnams don tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then things would have different referents.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: don tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no difference in meaning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'jig rten na mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is seen in the world.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na dngos po rnams don tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid mthong ste /

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: 'di dag la brten skye bas na //ğŸ”½de phyir 'di dag rkyen ces grag /'di dag la brten nas dngos po rnams skye bas na /
analyzed: 'di dag la brten skye bas na // de phyir 'di dag rkyen ces grag /'di dag la brten nas dngos po rnams skye bas na /

original: de'i phyir 'di dag rkyen du ston ces grag pas de la bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag rkyen du ston ces grag pas de la bshad par bya ste /
translated: Because things arise in dependence on them, therefore they are renowned as conditions.ğŸ”½But in response to that, NÄgÄrjuna explains:

original: ji srid mi skye de srid du //
analyzed: ji srid mi skye de srid du //

original: 'di dag rkyen min ji ltar min //
analyzed: 'di dag rkyen min ji ltar min //

analyzed: ji srid du dngos po mi skye ba de srid du 'di dag rkyen ma yin par yang ji ltar mi 'gyur te /
translated: So long as things do not arise, how could they not be nonconditions?

original: zhig pa dang ma zhig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zhig pa dang ma zhig pa bzhin no //
translated: Like that which has disintegrated and that which has not disintegrated.

original: yang gzhan yang /ğŸ”½med dam yod pa'i don la yang //
analyzed: yang gzhan yang / med dam yod pa'i don la yang //
translated: Moreover,ğŸ”½Conditions are not tenable

original: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //ğŸ”½rkyen ni dngos po med pa'i 'am /
analyzed: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te // rkyen ni dngos po med pa'i 'am /
translated: For a nonexistent or existent object.ğŸ”½Are conditions for a nonexistent thing

original: yod pa'i yin grang na /
analyzed: yod pa'i yin grang na /
translated: Or for an existent thing?

original: gnyi gar yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gnyi gar yang mi 'thad de /
translated: Both are untenable.

original: ma skyes pa dang skyes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang skyes pa bzhin no //

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /

original: bshad pa / med na gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //
analyzed: bshad pa / med na gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //

original: yod na rkyen gyis ci zhig bya //
analyzed: yod na rkyen gyis ci zhig bya //

original: dmus long bzhin nam thams cad mkhyen par zhin no //
analyzed: dmus long bzhin nam thams cad mkhyen par zhin no //
translated: Like one who is blind from birth or like one who is omniscient.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

analyzed: rkyen rnams spyir dgag pa ni byas na / de dag re re nas ji ltar dgag par bya / 'dir bshad pa /

analyzed: gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang // med dang yod med mi 'grub pa //

original: de lta yin na mi rigs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na mi rigs so //

original: 'di la chos gang rgyus sgrub par gyur na de yod pa'am med pa'am yod med gcig sgrub par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'di la chos gang rgyus sgrub par gyur na de yod pa'am med pa'am yod med gcig sgrub par 'gyur grang na /

analyzed: de la gang gi tshe yod pa yang sgrub par mi byed /

original: med pa yang sgrub par mi byed /
analyzed: med pa yang sgrub par mi byed /

analyzed: @34b yod med kyang sgrub par mi byed ba de'i tshe ji ltar sgrub par byed pa rgyu zhes bya ste /

original: de lta yin na mi rigs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na mi rigs so //

original: de ltar re zhig rgyu bkag zin to //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rgyu bkag zin to //

original: dmigs pa ji ltar dgag ce na /
analyzed: dmigs pa ji ltar dgag ce na /
translated: How is the object of apprehension refuted?ğŸ”½It is said:

original: bshad pa / yod pa'i chos 'di dmigs pa ni //
analyzed: bshad pa / yod pa'i chos 'di dmigs pa ni //

original: med pa kho nar nye bar bstan //
analyzed: med pa kho nar nye bar bstan //

original: de ltar chos 'di dmigs med na //
analyzed: de ltar chos 'di dmigs med na //

analyzed: dmigs pa yod par ga la 'gyur //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag tu chos gang bstan pa de ni ro gcig pa dmigs pa med pa kho na yin no zhes bka' stsal te /
translated: The Bhagavat said in the Perfection of Wisdom: â€œThe eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma that I have taught are of one taste, and that is the absence of an object of apprehension.â€

original: de ltar chos kyi dmigs pa med par bstan pa de la ci'i phyir dmigs pa yod par ston /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dmigs pa med par bstan pa de la ci'i phyir dmigs pa yod par ston /
translated: Thus, in this way, the object of observation of phenomena is taught to be nonexistent. Why is it taught that the object of observation exists?

original: dmigs pa de ni mi 'thad de nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa de ni mi 'thad de nam mkha' bzhin no //

original: de ma thag pa ji ltar dgag ce na /
analyzed: de ma thag pa ji ltar dgag ce na /

original: bshad pa / chos rnams skyes pas yin na //
analyzed: bshad pa / chos rnams skyes pas yin na //
translated: Since phenomena are produced,

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: de phyir de ma thag mi regs //
analyzed: de phyir de ma thag mi regs //
translated: Therefore, the immediately preceding condition is not contacted.

original: 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin //
analyzed: 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin //

original: chos rnams skye bar ston pa na //
analyzed: chos rnams skye bar ston pa na //

original: chos ma skyes pa rnams la 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos ma skyes pa rnams la 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /

original: 'gags na rkyen du bstan pa mi 'thad de med pa rkyen du bstan par bya ba de gang yin /
analyzed: 'gags na rkyen du bstan pa mi 'thad de med pa rkyen du bstan par bya ba de gang yin /

original: de ni de ma thag pa dgag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni de ma thag pa dgag pa'o //
translated: That is the refutation of the immediately preceding condition.

original: bdag po ji ltar dgag ce na /
analyzed: bdag po ji ltar dgag ce na /

original: bshad pa / dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi //
analyzed: bshad pa / dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi //
translated: NÄgÄrjuna responds:ğŸ”½If the existence of things

original: yod pa gang phyir yod min na //
analyzed: yod pa gang phyir yod min na //
translated: That lack intrinsic reality is not tenable,ğŸ”½Then it is not tenable to say,

original: 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung zhes //ğŸ”½bya ba de ni 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung zhes // bya ba de ni 'thad ma yin //
translated: â€œBecause this exists, that arises.â€

original: dngos po rang bzhin med pa rnams kyi yod pa zhes bya ba gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de 'thad ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po rang bzhin med pa rnams kyi yod pa zhes bya ba gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de 'thad ba ma yin te /
translated: If the existence of things that lack intrinsic reality is not tenable, then it is not tenable to say, â€œBecause this exists, that arises.â€

original: de ni bdag po dgag pa'o //ğŸ”½de ltar rkyen de dag spyi dang so sor bkag pas /
analyzed: de ni bdag po dgag pa'o // de ltar rkyen de dag spyi dang so sor bkag pas /
translated: This is the refutation of the dominant condition.

original: rkyen rnams so so 'dus pa las //
analyzed: rkyen rnams so so 'dus pa las //
translated: Thus, since the conditions have been refuted in general and individually,

original: 'bras bu de ni med pa nyid //ğŸ”½rkyen rnams la ni gang med pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ni med pa nyid // rkyen rnams la ni gang med pa //
translated: The effect does not existğŸ”½In the individual conditions or in their assembly.ğŸ”½How could that which does not exist

original: de ni rkyen las ji ltar skye //ğŸ”½rkyen rnams so so dang 'das pa dag la 'bras bu de med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de ni rkyen las ji ltar skye // rkyen rnams so so dang 'das pa dag la 'bras bu de med pa nyid yin na /
translated: In the conditions arise from conditions?

analyzed: rkyen rnams so so dang 'dus pa dag la med pa gang yin pa de rkyen las skye bar mi rigs so //
translated: If the effect does not exist in the individual conditions or in their assembly, then that which does not exist in the individual conditions or in their assembly does not arise from conditions.

original: ci ste de ni med par yang //
analyzed: ci ste de ni med par yang //

analyzed: rkyen de dag las skye @35a * // 'gyur na // rkyen min las kyang 'bras bu ni //

analyzed: ci yi phyir na skye mi 'gyur //

analyzed: ci ste 'bras bu de med par yang rkyen rnams las skye bar sems na /

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

analyzed: khyod kyis rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa zhes brjod pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yod do //

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /

analyzed: 'bras bu rkyen las byung yin na //

original: rkyen rnams rang las byung ma yin //ğŸ”½rang byung min las 'bras bu gang //
analyzed: rkyen rnams rang las byung ma yin // rang byung min las 'bras bu gang //
translated: The conditions do not arise from themselves.ğŸ”½How can an effect arise from conditions

original: de ni ji ltar rkyen las byung //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar rkyen las byung //

original: de phyir rkyen las byung ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir rkyen las byung ma yin //

analyzed: rkyen min las byung 'bras bu ni // yod min 'bras bu med pas na //
translated: An effect that does not arise from conditionsğŸ”½Does not exist. How can that which does not exist

original: rkyen min rkyen du ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: rkyen min rkyen du ga la 'gyur //
translated: Become a non-condition?

original: khyod kyis rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa dag yod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de la bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa dag yod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de la bshad par bya ste /

analyzed: 'di la khyod kyis sngar 'bras bu rkyen las byung ba yin no //

original: zhes bya ba de ltar bsams pa de la rigs pas rab tu brtags na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de ltar bsams pa de la rigs pas rab tu brtags na /

original: de lta bas na 'bras bu rkyen las byung ba yang med la /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'bras bu rkyen las byung ba yang med la /

analyzed: rkyen ma yin pa las byung ba yang med do //

analyzed: 'bras bu med bas na rkyen ma yin pa dang / rkyen dag kyang 'bras bu dang 'dra ba kho nar ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Since the effect does not exist, nonconditions and conditions do not exist inherently in the same way that the effect does.

original: smig rgyu bzhin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu bzhin no //

original: rkyen brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rkyen brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /

original: rab tu byed pa dang po'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa dang po'o /

original: // /'dir smras pa /
analyzed: // /'dir smras pa /

analyzed: 'di la dus gsum gyi gnas skabs kyi bya ba dag snang ste /

analyzed: dus gsum gyi gnas skabs tshad mar byas nas /

analyzed: song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag rgya cher bstan pas /

original: de'i phyir bya ba yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bya ba yod do //
translated: Therefore, activity exists.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here, NÄgÄrjuna explains:

original: re zhig song la 'gro med de //
analyzed: re zhig song la 'gro med de //
translated: First, there is no going where one has gone.

original: ma song ba la'ang 'gro ba med //
analyzed: ma song ba la'ang 'gro ba med //
translated: There is also no going where one has not gone.

original: song dang ma song ma gtogs par //
analyzed: song dang ma song ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from where one has gone and where one has not gone,

original: bgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½'di la re zhig song ba la 'gro ba med de /
analyzed: bgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ro // 'di la re zhig song ba la 'gro ba med de /
translated: one cannot discern that being gone over.

original: song zin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: song zin pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: bya ba dang bral ba la mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro // ma song ba la yang 'gro ba med de 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is untenable that it is devoid of activity.ğŸ”½There is also no going where one has not gone because there is no going there.

original: bgom pa la yang 'gro ba med de song ba dang ma song ba @35b dag ma gtogs par bgom pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bgom pa la yang 'gro ba med de song ba dang ma song ba @35b dag ma gtogs par bgom pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: There is also no going where one is going because apart from where one has gone and where one has not gone, that being gone over does not exist.

original: mar me dang snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: mar me dang snang ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like a lamp and its light.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: gang na g-yo ba de na 'gro / de yang gang gi bgom pa la //
analyzed: gang na g-yo ba de na 'gro / de yang gang gi bgom pa la //
translated: Where there is movement there is going, and that is on that being gone over.

original: g-yo ba song min ma song min //
analyzed: g-yo ba song min ma song min //
translated: Movement is not on that gone over or not yet gone over.

original: de phyir bgom la 'gro ba yod //ğŸ”½'di na gang na g-yo ba snang ba de na 'gro ba yod de /
analyzed: de phyir bgom la 'gro ba yod // 'di na gang na g-yo ba snang ba de na 'gro ba yod de /
translated: Therefore going exists on that being gone over.ğŸ”½Here, where movement is seen there is going.

original: de yang gang gi phyir bgom pa la snang gi g-yo ba song ba la yang mi snang /ğŸ”½ma song ba la yang mi snang ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir bgom pa la snang gi g-yo ba song ba la yang mi snang / ma song ba la yang mi snang ba de'i phyir /
translated: And that is because movement is seen on that being gone over, but not on that gone over,

original: bgom pa la yang 'gro ba yod do //
analyzed: bgom pa la yang 'gro ba yod do //
translated: nor on that not yet gone over. Therefore going exists on that being gone over.

original: 'dir bshad pa /ğŸ”½bgom la 'gro ba yod par ni //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / bgom la 'gro ba yod par ni //
translated: In response, NÄgÄrjuna explains:ğŸ”½How could it be tenable

original: ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur //ğŸ”½gang tshe 'gro ba med pa yi //
analyzed: ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur // gang tshe 'gro ba med pa yi //
translated: that going exists on that being gone over?ğŸ”½When going does not exist

original: bgom pa 'thad pa med phyir ro //
analyzed: bgom pa 'thad pa med phyir ro //
translated: that being gone over is not tenable.

original: 'di la bgom pa la 'gro ba yod pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'di la bgom pa la 'gro ba yod pa mi 'thad de /
translated: Here going does not exist on that being gone over.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'gro ba med pa'i bgom pa nges par gzung ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gro ba med pa'i bgom pa nges par gzung ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is untenable to apprehend that being gone over without going.

original: mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
translated: It is like the son of a barren woman.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: gang gi bgom la 'gro yod pa //ğŸ”½de yi 'gom la 'gro med par //
analyzed: gang gi bgom la 'gro yod pa // de yi 'gom la 'gro med par //
translated: If going exists on that being gone over,

original: thal bar 'gyur te gang gi phyir //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur te gang gi phyir //
translated: then going would not exist on that being gone over.ğŸ”½This follows because

original: bgom pa khong du chud phyir ro //
analyzed: bgom pa khong du chud phyir ro //
translated: the being gone over is understood.

original: 'di la gang gi phyogs la bgom pa la 'gro ba yod par 'dod pa de'i bgom pa la 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la gang gi phyogs la bgom pa la 'gro ba yod par 'dod pa de'i bgom pa la 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, for one who asserts that going exists on that being gone over, it follows that going would not exist on that being gone over.

analyzed: ma ltos par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it would be established without depending on it.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir bgom pa khong du chud pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bgom pa khong du chud pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the being gone over is understood.

original: tshig 'di la mngon bar zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig 'di la mngon bar zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the adherence to this statement.

original: de yang mi 'dod de /ğŸ”½de'i phyir bgom pa la 'gro ba yod do //
analyzed: de yang mi 'dod de / de'i phyir bgom pa la 'gro ba yod do //
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /

analyzed: re zhig skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dang ldan pa dang / rga ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba de dag ni 'khor ces bya'o //
translated: The wheel is the wheel of life, which is characterized by birth, duration, deterioration and destruction.

original: 'khor gyi nang dus 'dir chos gnyis po rnam par grol ba dang nges par byung ba nyid dag ni yang na log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang yin te /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang dus 'dir chos gnyis po rnam par grol ba dang nges par byung ba nyid dag ni yang na log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang yin te /
translated: In the midst of the wheel, the two dharmas, liberation and definitive release, are either liberation and definitive release or else, false liberation and false definitive release.

original: chos gang dag dkar po de dag gi ni rnam par grol ba yin la nag po de dag gi ni log pa'i rnam par grol ba yin no //ğŸ”½chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba de dag nyid yin la ;
analyzed: chos gang dag dkar po de dag gi ni rnam par grol ba yin la nag po de dag gi ni log pa'i rnam par grol ba yin no // chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba de dag nyid yin la ;
translated: Liberation is the good dharmas; false liberation is the bad dharmas.

original: chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: Definitive release is the dharmas that are definitive release; false definitive release is the dharmas that are not definitive release.

original: da ni 'khor gyi 'khor rnams ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: da ni 'khor gyi 'khor rnams ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Now, the wheels of the wheels are as follows:

original: skye ba'i skye ba dang / gnas pa'i gnas pa dang / 'jig pa'i 'jig pa dang / ldan pa'i ldan pa dang / rga ba'i rga ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dag ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba dang / gnas pa'i gnas pa dang / 'jig pa'i 'jig pa dang / ldan pa'i ldan pa dang / rga ba'i rga ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dag ste /
translated: the arising of arising, the enduring of enduring, the disintegrating of disintegrating, the possession of possession, the aging of aging, the liberation of liberation, and the renunciation of renunciation.

original: 'khor gyi 'khor rnams las kyang 'dir chos gnyis po rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dag kyang /
analyzed: 'khor gyi 'khor rnams las kyang 'dir chos gnyis po rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dag kyang /
translated: From among the wheels of the wheels, here the two phenomena of the liberation of liberation and the renunciation of renunciation

original: yang na log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang yin te /
analyzed: yang na log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang yin te /
translated: are also the liberation of liberation and the renunciation of renunciation of those that are correct, or the liberation of liberation and the renunciation of renunciation of those that are incorrect.

original: chos gang dag dkar po de dag gi ni rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba yin la /
analyzed: chos gang dag dkar po de dag gi ni rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba yin la /
translated: Those phenomena that are virtuous are the liberation of liberationğŸ”½and the renunciation of renunciation of those that are correct.

original: nag po de dag gi ni log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba yin no //
analyzed: nag po de dag gi ni log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i rnam par grol ba yin no //
translated: The liberation of those who are in the dark is the liberation of those who are in error.

original: chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: chos gang dag nges par 'byung ba de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid yin la /
translated: The deliverance of those who are delivered is the deliverance of those who are delivered.

original: gang dag nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang dag nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa de dag gi ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: The non-deliverance of those who are not delivered is the non-deliverance of those who are not delivered.

original: de ltar sde chan bco lnga'o //
analyzed: de ltar sde chan bco lnga'o //
translated: Thus there are fifteen categories.

original: de la rtsa ba'i skye ba gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid ma gtogs par chos bcu bzhi po thams @44b cad skyed bar byed do //
analyzed: de la rtsa ba'i skye ba gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid ma gtogs par chos bcu bzhi po thams @44b cad skyed bar byed do //
translated: The primary origination produces all dharmas except itself.

original: skye ba'i skye ba gang yin pa des ni rtsa ba'i skye ba de 'ba' zhig skyed par byed do //ğŸ”½rtsa ba'i gnas pa gang yin pa des kyang gnas pa'i gnas pa gnas par byed la /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba gang yin pa des ni rtsa ba'i skye ba de 'ba' zhig skyed par byed do // rtsa ba'i gnas pa gang yin pa des kyang gnas pa'i gnas pa gnas par byed la /
translated: The origination of origination produces only the primary origination.

original: gnas pa'i gnas pas kyang rtsa ba'i gnas pa gnas par byed do //
analyzed: gnas pa'i gnas pas kyang rtsa ba'i gnas pa gnas par byed do //
translated: The primary duration causes the primary duration to endure.ğŸ”½The duration of duration causes the primary duration to endure.

original: rtsa ba'i 'jig pas kyang 'jigs pa'i 'jig pa 'jig par byed la /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i 'jig pas kyang 'jigs pa'i 'jig pa 'jig par byed la /
translated: And the basic arising causes the arising of the arising of arising.

original: 'jigs pa'i 'jig pas kyang rtsa ba'i 'jig pa 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i 'jig pas kyang rtsa ba'i 'jig pa 'jig par byed do //
translated: And the arising of the arising causes the basic arising.

original: ldan pa dang rga ba dang rnam par grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba nyid dag la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: ldan pa dang rga ba dang rnam par grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba nyid dag la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
translated: The same should be understood for possession, aging, freedom, and deliverance.

original: de'i phyir skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag 'dus byas kyang yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag 'dus byas kyang yin la /
translated: Therefore arising, enduring, and disintegrating are conditioned phenomena.

original: thug pa med pa'i skyon du yang thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thug pa med pa'i skyon du yang thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And the error of infinite regress does not ensue.

original: gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
translated: The same should be understood for enduring and disintegrating.

original: sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of a seed and a sprout.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skyes //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skyes //
translated: If your arising of arising

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed byed na //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed byed na //
translated: Causes the arising of the basic arising,

original: khyod kyi rtsa bas ma bskyed des //
analyzed: khyod kyi rtsa bas ma bskyed des //
translated: Then that which is not caused to arise by the basic arising

original: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
translated: How could it cause the arising of that?

original: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed na /
translated: If your arising of arising causes the arising of the basic arising, then that which is not caused to arise by the basic arising

original: khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bsam bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed par byed de /
analyzed: khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bsam bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed par byed de /
translated: But how could the arising of arising, which is the primary cause of your arising, give rise to the primary cause?

original: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not arisen itself.

original: ci ste 'di snyam du rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa kho na'i skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skye dang par byed kyi ma bskyed pas mi byed par sems na /
analyzed: ci ste 'di snyam du rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa kho na'i skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skye dang par byed kyi ma bskyed pas mi byed par sems na /
translated: But if you think that the arising of arising, which is given rise to by the primary cause, gives rise to the primary cause, but that which is not given rise to does not,

original: de la bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la bshad par bya ste /
translated: then NÄgÄrjuna explains:

original: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba yis //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba yis //
translated: If the primary cause

original: bskyed pa de yis rtsa bskyed nas //ğŸ”½des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba des //
analyzed: bskyed pa de yis rtsa bskyed nas // des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba des //
translated: gives rise to it,ğŸ”½then how could the primary cause

original: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
translated: that is not given rise to by it give rise to it?

original: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye bde skyed par byed na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye bde skyed par byed na /
translated: If the arising of arising, which is given rise to by the primary cause, gives rise to the primary cause,

original: skye ba'i skye ba des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i skye ba des skye ba'i skye ba ji ltar skyed par byed de /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i skye ba des skye ba'i skye ba ji ltar skyed par byed de /
translated: then how could the primary cause that is not given rise to by the arising of arising give rise to the arising of arising?

original: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it itself has not arisen.

original: de lta bas na brtag pa des kyang mi nus pas ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa med do //
analyzed: de lta bas na brtag pa des kyang mi nus pas ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since it cannot be established by that analysis, it does not exist essentially.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba nyid skye bzhin pas skye ba'i skye bskyed par byed kyi ma skyes pas mi byed do //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba nyid skye bzhin pas skye ba'i skye bskyed par byed kyi ma skyes pas mi byed do //
translated: The basic arising itself causes the generation of the arising of arising, but not the non-arisen.

original: 'dir bshad pa /ğŸ”½khyod kyi de ni de bzhin pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / khyod kyi de ni de bzhin pa /
translated: In response, Aryadeva says:

original: ma skyes de yis gal te ni //
analyzed: ma skyes de yis gal te ni //
translated: If that which is not arisen

original: de ni skyed par byed nus na //ğŸ”½de skyed par ni 'dod la rag / khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bde skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te skye ba'i skye ba gzhan de skyang par byed nus na ni /
analyzed: de ni skyed par byed nus na // de skyed par ni 'dod la rag / khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bde skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te skye ba'i skye ba gzhan de skyang par byed nus na ni /
translated: could cause the generation of that,ğŸ”½then that which is not arisenğŸ”½would cause the generation of that.

original: skye ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag la mi nus te /ğŸ”½de'i phyir khyod kyi rtsa @45a * //
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag la mi nus te / de'i phyir khyod kyi rtsa @45a * //
translated: If that basic arising which is in the process of arising, but not yet arisen, could cause the generation of that other arising of arising, then you would have to assert that it causes the generation of that.ğŸ”½But it cannot.

original: ba'i skye ba des skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des skye ba'i skye ba gzhan de bskyed par mi nus so //
analyzed: ba'i skye ba des skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des skye ba'i skye ba gzhan de bskyed par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, that basic arising which is in the process of arising, but not yet arisen, cannot cause the generation of that other arising of arising.

original: yang na 'di ni rtag pa bzhin te /
analyzed: yang na 'di ni rtag pa bzhin te /
translated: Or, it is like permanence.

original: khyod kyi skye ba'i skye ba de skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te rtsa ba'i skye ba gzhan te /
analyzed: khyod kyi skye ba'i skye ba de skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te rtsa ba'i skye ba gzhan te /
translated: If the arising of arising gives rise to the basic arising,

original: skyed par byed nus na ni rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag na mi nus te /
analyzed: skyed par byed nus na ni rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag na mi nus te /
translated: then it must be able to give rise to the basic arising, but it cannot.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyi skye ba'i skye ba de skyed bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des rtsa ba'i skye ba gzhan de skyed par mi nus so //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyi skye ba'i skye ba de skyed bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des rtsa ba'i skye ba gzhan de skyed par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, the arising of arising, which is not itself arisen, cannot give rise to the basic arising.

original: ci'i phyir skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes she na /
translated: Why is that which is in the process of arising not itself arisen?

original: skye bzhin pa ni yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye bzhin pa ni yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is in the process of arising is not fully established.

original: de la skye bzhin pa des de skyed par byed do zhes gang smras pa de mi rigs te zhig pa dang ma zhig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de la skye bzhin pa des de skyed par byed do zhes gang smras pa de mi rigs te zhig pa dang ma zhig pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say, â€œThat which is in the process of arising gives rise to that.â€ It is like the past and the future.

original: 'dir smras pa /ğŸ”½ji ltar mar me rang dang gzhan //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / ji ltar mar me rang dang gzhan //
translated: Here, someone might say,ğŸ”½Just as a lamp

original: snang bar byed pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa de bzhin du //
translated: illuminates itself and others,ğŸ”½so too arising

original: skye ba'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
analyzed: skye ba'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
translated: gives rise to itself and others.

original: gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin /
analyzed: gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin /
translated: Both are produced.

original: ji ltar mar me rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po gnyi ga snang bar byed pa de bzhin du skye ba yang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mar me rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po gnyi ga snang bar byed pa de bzhin du skye ba yang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: Just as a lamp illuminates both itself and others, so too arising causes the generation of both itself and others.

original: 'dir bshad pa /ğŸ”½mar me dang ni gang dag na //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / mar me dang ni gang dag na //
translated: Here we say:ğŸ”½A lamp does not illuminate

original: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
analyzed: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
translated: itself or others.

original: mar mes ci zhig snang bar byed //
analyzed: mar mes ci zhig snang bar byed //
translated: What does a lamp illuminate?

original: mun pa sel bas snang byed yin //ğŸ”½'di na mar me la yang mun pa med la /ğŸ”½gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na yang mun pa med de /
analyzed: mun pa sel bas snang byed yin // 'di na mar me la yang mun pa med la / gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na yang mun pa med de /
translated: It is a light because it removes darkness.ğŸ”½Here a lamp does not illuminate itself.

original: gang gi tshe mar me la yang mun pa med la /ğŸ”½gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na yang mun pa med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mar me la yang mun pa med la / gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na yang mun pa med pa de'i tshe /
translated: Nor does it illuminate others, because darkness does not exist there.ğŸ”½Since a lamp does not illuminate itselfğŸ”½and does not illuminate others,

original: da mar mes rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po ci zhig snang bar byed /
analyzed: da mar mes rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po ci zhig snang bar byed /
translated: what does a lamp illuminate?

original: mun pa sel bas snang byed yin zhes bya na /
analyzed: mun pa sel bas snang byed yin zhes bya na /
translated: It is a light because it removes darkness.

original: mun pa sel bas de yang gang gi phyir mar mes rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po la mi byed pa de'i phyir mar mes rang gi dngos po yang snang bar byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: mun pa sel bas de yang gang gi phyir mar mes rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po la mi byed pa de'i phyir mar mes rang gi dngos po yang snang bar byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Since a lamp does not illuminate itself and another, therefore a lamp does not illuminate its own entity,

original: gzhan gyi dngos po yang snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po yang snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: and it does not illuminate the entity of another.

original: byi la dang byi ba bzhin no //
analyzed: byi la dang byi ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like a cat and a mouse.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone says:

original: gang gi phyir mar me skye bzhin pa nyid kyis mun pa sel bar byed pa de'i phyir mar me dang gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na mun pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mar me skye bzhin pa nyid kyis mun pa sel bar byed pa de'i phyir mar me dang gang dag na mar me de 'dug pa de dag na mun pa med do //
translated: Since a lamp that is arising itself clears away darkness, therefore where that lamp is located, there is no darkness.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here, the response is:

original: ji ltar mar me skyo bzhin pas //
analyzed: ji ltar mar me skyo bzhin pas //
translated: How does a lamp that is arising

original: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
translated: clear away darkness?

original: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
translated: When a lamp that is arising

original: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med //ğŸ”½ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas //
analyzed: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med // ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas //
translated: does not contact darkness.

original: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin te /
translated: How does a lamp that is arising clear away darkness?

original: gang gi tshe mar me skye bzhin pa de'i tshe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mar me skye bzhin pa de'i tshe na /
translated: When a lamp is arising, at that timeğŸ”½it does not contact darkness.

original: mun pa dang @45b phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mun pa dang @45b phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because darkness does not contact it.

original: yang gzhan yang /ğŸ”½mar me phrad pa med par yang //
analyzed: yang gzhan yang / mar me phrad pa med par yang //
translated: Moreover:ğŸ”½If a lamp clears darkness

original: gal te mun pa sel byed na //ğŸ”½'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun //
analyzed: gal te mun pa sel byed na // 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun //
translated: Without contacting it,ğŸ”½Then the darkness

original: 'di na 'dug pa des spel 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di na 'dug pa des spel 'gyur //
translated: Abiding in the entire world would be cleared by it.

original: ji ste yang 'di snyam du mar me dang phrad pa med par yang mun pa sel bar byed par sems na /
analyzed: ji ste yang 'di snyam du mar me dang phrad pa med par yang mun pa sel bar byed par sems na /
translated: If you think that a lamp clears darkness without contacting it,

original: de la bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la bshad par bya ste /
translated: then NÄgÄrjuna explains:ğŸ”½If a lamp clears darkness

original: gal te mar me dang phrad pa med par yang /
analyzed: gal te mar me dang phrad pa med par yang /
translated: Without contacting it,

original: mun pa sel bar byed na ni 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun pa dag kyang mar me 'di na 'dug pa des bsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mun pa sel bar byed na ni 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun pa dag kyang mar me 'di na 'dug pa des bsal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the darkness abiding in the entire world would be cleared by this lamp that is here.

original: phrad pa med par 'dra na /ğŸ”½mar me skye bzhin pas 'di na 'dug pa'i mun pa 'di sel la /
analyzed: phrad pa med par 'dra na / mar me skye bzhin pas 'di na 'dug pa'i mun pa 'di sel la /
translated: Because it is similar in not contacting it.

original: 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun pa ni mi sel ba la khyad par ci yod /
analyzed: 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun pa ni mi sel ba la khyad par ci yod /
translated: What is the difference between the lamp that is arising clearing the darkness that is here and the lamp that is arising not clearing the darkness that is abiding in the entire world?
